laserDevice.jobSentText: Job was sent as '$jobname' Please: 1. Is an expert present? ->Yes: Continue with step 2. ->No: Get one! 2. Check if no one is disturbed by the ventilation noise 3. Check material position and if it can be cut also set home needed NO PVC or Teflon-like! 4. Close lid 5. Make entry in the LaserLog! (double-check settings) 6. Turn on filter system and compressor The compressor might not start if it was turned on resently. Release the pressure in the tube if needed. 7. Laser away! -And press 'start' on the Lasercutter $name
laserDevice.name: Epilog Legend 36 EXT
